description:
This NFT comes with downloadable digital file of Spearit Bear's song "Chant". Purchase of this NFT transfers ownership of the digital file and image, not the right to ownership of the music itself. Commercial use of the image or the music file, aside from the resale of this NFT, must be requested and approved by Spearit Bear beforehand. This song was first released on streaming platforms in 2020 but is now exclusively available here.
This song was written after Breonna Taylor was murdered in her home by police officers and the beginning contains real news clips from that time. 
R.I.P. Breonna Taylor and all of those whose lives were wrongfully taken by police.
This music NFT qualifies as one that can be collected to add to the 5 total needed for a collector to be considered a 'Distributor' and receive monthly Distributor pool payments from secondary sale royalties. More info at spearitbear.com/nfts
